text: @realDonaldTrump No you idiot. People are losing their jobs because U dropped the ball on the entire COVID19 crisis! Over 30,000 Americans are dead & over 33 million people lost their jobs because you downplayed it and while you should have been getting the nation ready you were playing golf!
